title: Luxury House For Sale in Colombo 7
details:
Luxury House For Sale in Colombo 7

DESCRIPTION

12.5 Perches / 3500 sqft / 5 bedrooms / 4 Washrooms / Up stair House / Roof top terrace /
Bar area / Wet kitchen & Dry kitchen / Pantry / Living area / Dining room / Prayer room /
TV room / 2 Vehicle Garage with roller door.

LOCATION

House is located in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location in Colombo 7 & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc, it is only about few minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.
